newsitem.title: KUWAIT: Kuwait 182-day T-bill rate rises to 7.218 pct.
newsitem.headline: Kuwait 182-day T-bill rate rises to 7.218 pct.

text.p: The average yield at this week's tender for 60 million dinars of six-month Kuwaiti treasury bills rose to 7.218 percent from 7.168 percent last week, official figures show.
The bills, offered on Monday, were issued on Wednesday. They mature on February 19.
The average accepted price was 96.526. Bids were made for 91.444 million dinars of the six-month bills.
The highest accepted price was 96.512, with a yield of 7.248 percent. The lowest accepted price was 96.547, with a yield of 7.173 percent.
There was no tender this week for three-month bills.
